old: まったく、落ち着く暇もないわね
column2: Not a moment to relax at all.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old:
なに？
特に話題も無いのに話しかけてこないで
column2: What is it? Don't talk to me when there's nothing to talk about.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old:
少しでもいいから休憩したいのよ
足が棒みたいよ
column2: I need a break, even just a little one. My legs feel like sticks.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old: はぁ――あんたも懲りないわよね
column2: Sigh... You never learn, do you?
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier
